problem.markdown:
1. In multi-storey structure mass should be lumped at centre of columns. () True (x) False
2) Number of mode shapes is equal to number of degrees of freedom. (a) True () False
3)For even number of floors modes shapes will not be orthogonal. () True (x) False
4) Lowest eigen value is considered as most useful valu. (a) True () False
5) All the modes contribute equally to the complete response of the building. () True (b) False
problem.p: 1. In multi-storey structure mass should be lumped at centre of columns.
2) Number of mode shapes is equal to number of degrees of freedom.
3)For even number of floors modes shapes will not be orthogonal.
4) Lowest eigen value is considered as most useful valu.
5) All the modes contribute equally to the complete response of the building.
